title: Looking for people to play with
body:
Gold 1. Play any role, have skype but I'd rather use discord. Just casual games, I might be up for ranked.
Whatevs really, reply here or msg in-game 69er

(completely cool with lower rank peps, bf is low silver & might tag in)

replies.body:
Plat team looking for players. 0 salt tolerance. We use discord. Looking for a top/mid lane. 

Add if interested

Do you mind to duo with me for normal games to farm hexchest?
Im silver 1
im keen ill add you but really not into toxic people just so you know
Sweet, I'm up for meeting some new people ;') Add me.

> [{quoted}](name=Cuddly Panda,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=ZB0fN6dX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-15T10:00:20.740+0000)
>
> Sweet, I'm up for meeting some new people ;') Add me.

Done
